channel.title: null[HELP]
channel.description:
okay well i was wondering, how can i make it check if the player is a player or null, and if its a null, close the connection? cuz every so often i find at least 1 null, like 1-3 and it kinda pisses off some ppl since it means the person cant log on there file and i have a null...
[size=15pt]help me plawks?[/size]

item.title: null[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Coder xynt, post:1, topic:247878”][quote author=Coder xynt link=topic=326883.msg2560076#msg2560076 date=1228091823]
It’s because someone is ‘flooding’ your server with null(s).

Nulls are created when the client sends the 14 bytes to the server, the server recieves those bytes and creates a client object with username and password null. Until the server recieves the correct packet(s) it will mantain them null. In other words, wL’s login protocol is shitty.

Use this tutorial:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]

What you can do to check if it’s a null is very simple. You can add a timer from the time the client sends the corresponding 14 bytes to the server, until the username and password packet(s) have been sent. If a specific amount of seconds have passed and the username and password packets have not been sent, then you’ll know it’s a null. But it will be of no use, since the client object has already been created.

Basically, your solution is to re-factor wL’s login protocol. Take a look at the tutorial I posted (link above(where I quoted)).[/quote]
Be right back, taking a Stream class and the login method from a client and going to keep repeating it. Nice work, it won’t work

[quote=“silabgarza, post:10, topic:247616”]coder its not like that, ppl randomly get disconnected, from there client, the file logs out but the player just stays there as a null, which is impossible 2 fix… well im sure its possible, but idk…

its kinda strange… ppl log in, after a while (random person) some1 comes up 2 me and says they cant login, i look at the run prompt and it says a bunch of “loging in, loged in, alredy online, saved, disconected.”

and that gets annoying… so they make a new file…

also same thing when they have an invalid username, if its a bad name, it makes a null from there ip, then they try again, thats 2 nulls, then 3rd try, they cant login cuz of my anti null

heres my invalid name checker if u need 2 c it, perhaps revise it so it duzn’t make them into a null?

if (!playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*[A-Za-z0-9]+") || playerName.matches("[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*(__|_ | _| )+[A-Za-z0-9_ ]*")) { System.out.println("Bad Username: Failed for '"+playerName+"'"); checkbannedusers(); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; return; }[/quote]
Why are you (badly) using Regex, when you don’t even understand it?

Read full topic
